law.catch_line: Petitions For Adoption Or Revision Of Charter Or Suggestion Of Charter Amendment; Form

text.section: A petition for the adoption or revision of a charter shall conform with the requirements of subsection (c) and shall have a sentence in substantially the following form at the top of each page:

A petition suggesting a charter amendment under section ten shall conform with the requirements of subsection (c) and shall have a sentence in substantially the following form at the top of each page:
The state secretary shall prescribe the form of all petitions under this chapter. No petition shall contain or be accompanied by any indication of party or political designation.
